Package utilities

Class Word

java.lang.Object
utilities.Word
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Word>
public class Word
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Word>, java.io.Serializable
Word Class which stores the string data and location of words read from a given file
Version:
August 9th 2021
Author:
Don Laliberte, Elie Kabengele, Jared Smith, Jaekyung Jeon
See Also:
Serialized Form
